phrases: My club's going on a vacation.
Oh, yeah, I sort of feel like you told me that... did you?
I am not going to be home for a while, got it?
What, you are leaving me here all alone?!
It is not my fault, you know.
Shu says he is abandoning me!
You are going to Oshima, right?
Pay your father a visit, then.
We are here, we are here!
I am so glad it is not raining.
So, I hear we are heading to your family's vacation house?
I lived here when I was a little kid.
You mean the one in my class?
We are going to infiltrate a GHQ facility there.
We need his Void's power to break through their security.
All you have to do is invite him on a trip.
You cannot tell me that is hard.
He does not understand my feelings at all.
What do your folks do for a living, Ouma?
Gai said the Kuhouin Group arranged it for us.
There you two go getting affectionate again.
Save it for when you are at home, okay?
You do live together, do not you?
There is nothing between Inori and me.
She is got a violent older brother, and I happened to know her, so...
We do not need to hear excuses!
Let us leave the lovebirds alone and go hit the beach!
Wait, should not we unpack and
We are at a resort, guys!
We got to have all the fun we can!
I have a hard time dealing with Souta.
He is pushy, he has no tact, and he is oblivious to everyone around him...
If it were not for this mission, I would never go on a trip with him...
I let my guard down, did not I?
Let us go swim with them!
It seems Tamadate Souta made it here without issue.
He is having way too much fun for someone on a mission!
Should we really be lettin' them goof off?
Everything is going well so far.
The issue here is the facility's security.
Tsugumi and Ayase are looking into that now.
So we are just on standby for a while, huh?
But what the hell could be on this island, anyway?
He said he had a stop to make.
Come to think of it, Oshima is where his father's...
Tsugumi, why are you in that ridiculous getup?
Your outfit looks splendiferous on you too, Madame Ayase.
He was a professor at the old Tennozu College.
He was also the leading expert on the Apocalypse Virus.
Why do not you know about him?
We do not talk about stuff like that at home.
I heard that he was Haruka's teacher, though...
Anyway, I do not really remember my dad.
He died ten years ago, after all.
Say, what are you doing here?
It is not to visit a grave, is it?
It is a secret GHQ facility.
The rock that started it all.
That is what we need to get our hands on most right now.
You and the Void you draw will be the key to the operation.
Bring him to the designated point by then.
You make it sound so easy...
I hear he is an Egoist fan.
You want me to use Inori?!
You use something the other person is interested in to bring him in.
It is the most basic play there is.
Even if that something is Inori?!
I can see there is no point in arguing any further.
If you cannot do it, you do not have to.
I have not gone on a trip with friends in forever!
Thanks for coming with us, Kanon.
I am a member of the club, you know.
But since Yahiro did not come...
He does not have anything to do with this!
I am so glad you are here.
If I were all alone with Yuzuriha, I would...
Wow, Inori, you have got great skin!
I wonder how Yuzuriha feels about Shu.
Is there really nothing between you and Inori?
I told you before, there really is not
If there is not, I am going for it.
A mission you drag your friends into...
It is certainly not a job that suits Ouma.
That is what friends are for.
A life with no adventure in it is boring.
The least a friend can do is stir up a little trouble in your heart.
I am not entirely convinced he is even my son.
His mother was a no-good woman.
The stars are really pretty, huh?
We hardly ever see them in Tokyo... well, I guess this is Tokyo too, huh.
There is no problem with leaving them alone together.
There is something I want to show you.
I was so touched by Egoist's music video, I just could not contain myself.
So I tried making one of my own.
I beg you, please tell me
He is doing something I would do...
Does he think Inori'll be interested in just any guy who does that?
Why do people fight and hurt each other?
When your singing moved me, that feeling was real!
I want to know you better, Inori!
Hey, what is the big idea?
Do not draw that thing out here!
How long have you been there?!
There will be no change of plans.
We will go now, as is.
The issue is what is inside here.
When you confess your feelings, you should do a proper job.
Shu, shoot the gate with that camera.
Is this a Void for opening things?
I am just a wraith passing by.
Could they be on to us?
No, this is not about us.
Why would a Void like this come from inside Souta?
I could not care less about the reason.
I should have known it was you, Keido.
The double grief of a lost bliss is to recall its happy hour in pain...
I am not going to help you anymore.
You have feelings for Inori after all, do not you?
If you feel that way, then tell me from the start!
I never know what you are thinking!
You are pushy, you have no tact, and you are oblivious to everyone around you!
That really bothers me about you.
I have a hard time dealing with you, Souta.
I should have been honest from the start.
If he was my friend, anyway...
I am glad you gave it to me straight.
I mean, you are always kind of distant, you know?
The truth is, it was a little hard for me to deal with you, too.
So I am glad that you were honest.
That means you have opened up to me, right?
I know it is a little late to ask this, but... what are Voids?
I do not really understand them yet, but I get the feeling I have to.
I mean, after all, my right hand is touching people's hearts.
Gai told me that Voids change along with the states of people's hearts.
So does that mean if I form a bond with someone, my power changes too?
and tries to hurt you with cruel words,
even if the world does not try to believe you
and places a crown of thorns upon your head,
I can take your side, and yours alone
I know your pain and loneliness
So everything that makes me whole
I will give that to you now
These days you love me no more
nor am I still treasured by you
What did you tell me when we parted?
The words hung in midair and never reached me
I know my dreams and wishes are illusory
and yet I cannot give up on them
You said, Do not let go, hold onto my hand
and, We will always be together
Your hands as I held them were warm
These days you love me no more
nor am I still treasured by you
What did you tell me when we parted?
The words hung in midair and never reached me
I know my dreams and wishes are illusory
and yet I cannot give up on them
You said, Do not let go, hold onto my hand
and, We will always be together
Your hands as I held them were warm
